subtree.caption: Inconsistent glue for name server colo.to.
subtree.description: The address of a name server differed between the child and the parent.  This is a configuration error and should be corrected as soon as possible.

subtree.caption: Could not find reverse address for 46.101.233.168 (168.233.101.46.in-addr.arpa.).
subtree.description: PTR record(s) for the address could not be found in the .arpa-zone. (ip6.arpa. for IPv6 addresses and in-addr.arpa. for IPv4).

subtree.caption: Name server ns1.iafrica.com (196.7.0.139) does not answer queries over TCP.
subtree.description: The name server failed to answer queries sent over TCP.  This is probably due to the name server not correctly set up or due to misconfgured filtering in a firewall. It is a rather common misconception that DNS does not need TCP unless they provide zone transfers - perhaps the name server administrator is not aware that TCP usually is a requirement.
